title: Moon Jewel Ayurveda Offerings
cleaned_text: Moon Jewel offers a wide variety of traditional Ayurvedic therapies for both rejuvenating and detoxifying the body, mind and spirit. These are deeply profound therapies that often require taking pause for the remainder of the day. Note: As we individualize each treatment for maximum benefit, we require 48 hours notice so that we may prepare for your arrival.
